pages.title: Mekanism Fluid Port
pages.text: The Mekanism Fluid Port allow you to extract vapor from an $(l:bigreactors:reactor/active)actively cooled$(/l) Reactor as a Mekanism Gas.$(br2)This Port automatically convert the vapor into a gas if a Mekanism Rotary recipe exist for the fluid stored inside the Reactor. The conversion rate defined by the Rotary recipe is respected.
$(l)Mandatory:$() no$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Variants:$() Reinforced$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
